thread.section_title: Amalfi Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: another excellent stay
thread.title_full: another excellent stay - Review of Amalfi Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ianharris
title: another excellent stay
text:
this hotel is in a excellent place near the train station the room we had was 316 with a balcony,the room was very clean with fresh towels each day and the staff is excellent you do get a breakfast each morning we had two trips very early in the morning we told the staff there this and they made us up a breakfast bag to take with us we will be going back to this hotel again
Room Tip: have a high floor room See more room tips
